Welcome to vcore's documentation!
=================================

The vcore project is a visualization project, which currently supports as backend docker.

The main purpose of this project is to support distributed virtual environments

from building the environment to running it.

The api
=======

the project uses a rest api architecture.

currently there is a python package for using the api

`Python api </>`_

Vcore
=====

`Rest api </>`_

Contribute to the vcore project, read the contribution docs.

`Contribute </>`_

`Architecture </>`_
